title: What are the best things to read in this new era? - Quora

response.answer_text: Acharya Prashant books. The entire collection is worth reading and reflecting upon life. Understanding of mind is more important in life otherwise lot of concepts are floating in which we are caught up. Suffering is what we see in name of anything.Acharya Prashant books are simple and contain deeper understanding of life. His collections are available online. Few Titles are Freedom Book of myths Flying kiss to the sky Joy Personality

The “best”??? How does one judge that? In order better to understand the enormous outpouring of violence in the Islamic world, I would recommend that everyone read the Koran for himself. It is the most influential book in the world.
